Title: Authorizes retail licensees for on-premises consumption to sell and/or deliver alcoholic beverages for consumption off the premises
Summary: Authorizes retail licensees for on-premises consumption to sell and/or deliver alcoholic beverages for consumption off the premises, within certain size limitations, that such licensees are currently licensed to sell.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing retail licensees for on-premises consumption to sell and/or deliver alcoholic beverages for consumption off the premises
